signature: void putAll(int, Map<? extends K, ? extends V>)

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve inserting elements into the map at specific indices, which requires similar state changes in the internal list and map.
Both methods handle the insertion of multiple key-value pairs into the map, though one specifies an index and the other does not.
Both methods involve operations that can throw IndexOutOfBoundsException, which can inform the construction of assertions for error handling.
Both methods return the previous value associated with the key, which can be used to construct assertions about the state of the map before and after the operation.
